text:
It would be great if the project description tag could preserve formatting 
whilst also containing optional attributes to help with the -projecthelp arg.

eg.
 <description helplocation="end">
   To run the main app: 
    ant clean compile jar run

   To run the test app:
    ant clean test_compile jar test_run
 </description>
creator: robert.harvey@nokia.com
jan@materne.de
text:
Formatting is preservered since Ant 1.5.

I dont see any benefit any additional attributes, but feel free to reopen and
give further information, ideas (and patches).

Main problem (keeping formatting) is done in 1.5 (after 2002-07-08), so I'll
close as FIXED.
